snippet.title: Bob's Dragon Hunt
snippet.description: This DOS game is kind of a roguelike, kind of early 90s "virtual reality," and completely terrible.  Watch and weep.  Although I haven't played this game in years, I'm not getting my ass kicked just because I'm bad at it.  Almost every attempt to play this game ends with the player getting beaten down by grotesque clumps of polygons.
